com.noelios.restlet.ext.simple

Class SimpleCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.noelios.restlet.http.HttpCall
      • com.noelios.restlet.http.HttpServerCall
        • com.noelios.restlet.ext.simple.SimpleCall

  • public class SimpleCall
extends HttpServerCall
    Call that is used by the Simple HTTP server.
    Author:
    Lars Heuer, Jerome Louvel
